name: stewed

stewed adjective
(FRUIT/MEAT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
cooked slowly in a small amount of liquid: stewed fruit
stewed adjective
(TEA)
UK Stewed tea has been kept too long before it is poured, and is therefore strong and bitter.
